title: New: Danger Beach – Black Rain
content:
Australia is rapidly proving itself to be a force to be reckoned with when it comes to emerging music, producing dozens of a fantastic new artists over the last twelve months.

Canberra based musician Lachlan Thomas and his Danger Beach project are sure to be at the forefront of any blog hype, with their addictively psychedelic swing-pop, characterised by recent single Black Rain. Featuring the vocal talents of Tim Guthrie, it’s three and a half minutes of percussion driven weirdness; part folk, part electronica, and one hundred percent deliriously enjoyable.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
